Package io.github.eutro.wasm2j.core.conf.itf

Interface FunctionConvention

All Superinterfaces:
ConstructorCallback, ExportableConvention, ExtContainer
All Known Implementing Classes:
FunctionConvention.Delegating, InstanceFunctionConvention
public interface FunctionConvention extends ExportableConvention, ConstructorCallback, ExtContainer
The convention for a WebAssembly function, defining how the function can be called, referenced, exported, and added to the constructor.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • emitCall

      void emitCall(IRBuilder ib, Effect effect)
      Emit code for a WebAssembly call instruction.

      The effect will have an instruction of type WasmOps.CALL,
      with as many arguments as the function has parameter types;
      it will assign to as many variables as the function has return types.

      Parameters:
      ib - The instruction builder.
      effect - The effect.

    • emitFuncRef

      void emitFuncRef(IRBuilder ib, Effect effect)
      Emit code for a WebAssembly ref.func instruction.

      The effect will have an instruction of type WasmOps.FUNC_REF,
      with no arguments;
      it will assign to one variable: the returned function reference.

      Parameters:
      ib - The instruction builder.
      effect - The effect.
